title: Rising Dawn Ward Skin Bug
body: Used essence to add rising dawn ward skin as a permanent ward skin. However, the ward skin is not shown in the selection for ward skins even though the purchase history shows it.

replies.body: I've received a report that the issue has been resolved. Can you confirm whether this is the case?
Hey! This is a visual bug on our end. (Sorry!) You should own the skin, and once this issue is resolved, it'll show in your inventory!
